thread.section_title: The Logo Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Company | thelogocompany.net
thread.title: April
thread.title_full: The Logo Company reviewed by April

author: April
title: April
text:
I am a new business owner and have never designed a logo before. I knew kind of what I wanted and the direction I wanted to take the logo in. The Logo Company listened to me and made the process so easy. They surpassed my expectations. I am so proud of my logo! I highly recommend them, they will not disappoint you.
April Weldon
The Big Rusty Horse
Texas
